sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Incidental) Once per game session, when attempting to purchase a legally available item, the character may reduce its rarity by one step per rank of Know Somebody.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Know somebody</name> <number>TAL0001072</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-22 03:34:43</sys_created_on> <sys_id>a04c9838db224c542901de90cf9619a8</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-22 03:34:43</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
